channel.title: Why not?
channel.description: This community has all this talent. we have server Programmers, 2d artist, 3d model maker, and client programmers. But Most of it is wasted. All these RS remakes are great and all, but if you really want it that bad just play RS. Why dont the community come together and a site server? Use the RS world. but with own models, story line, revised game engine, interfaces. Just make our own game. Im not talking about just putting and npc here and their like most of the servers today. Im talking about a full scale game. I know it will take time. But it think if the community could come together and pull something like this off. It could take us to the next level.

item.title: Why not?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Why not?

Because this has been discussed over 9000 times before. And your idea is terrible ‘use the RS world’ but remake the game engine and everything else? Are you insane? The idea for a community game has been discussed already though, and if you really want to get it going you’re going to have to wait, there is too much going on right now anyways. If you want to look, do a search for Moparmon, and check on gamedev.

Read full topic

item.title: Why not?
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:17, topic:447506”][quote author=poopler40 link=topic=550400.msg4034084#msg4034084 date=1341033399]

Search for exactly what you posted moron?
I come to this website to call people morons, you don’t?

it makes me feel superior and internet strong

also, searching “why not” in the search bar isn’t going to bring up a lot of results.

lol trying searching for me and tell me what you get

Poeple come to this community to better themselves with coding, 2d artistry, 3d modeling, ect. If you dont like it then get the fuck out.

Community Server

Just one of many posted.
Yes that may be true but this is also the General Discussion Forum.
Need I explain further?

comparing what was in the thread to what i said are completely THE SAME so find another way to be a douche.

and as you said this si the general discussion forum so i can make a thread about what ever the fuck i want.

Btw with your explanations then your the moron with the threads about the servers you created. They have been made a million times before. So shut the fuck up

Where’s the facepalm smiley when you need it?
You, are indeed a moron. I’m not going to continue arguing further if you’re just going to be completely ignorant and oblivious about everything.

We’ve talked about this countless times

Your done because all your arguments are invalid and you have nothing else to say so just shut the fuck up.
[/quote]
No, I’m done because I know david won’t appreciate me putting you down constantly and it will end in me muted, but I have nothing to lose so why not?

Btw with your explanations then your the moron with the threads about the servers you created. They have been made a million times before. So shut the fuck up

To this, obviously not since it’s been changed, modified, and made my own also taking into consideration that’s the point of the server download’s section, moron.

and as you said this si the general discussion forum so i can make a thread about what ever the fuck i want.

Sure, as david says you can make a thread “about what ever the fuck you want.” but that doesn’t mean you can spam the website with useless already discussed and closed topics, moron.

Keep posting, because I will continue to put you down further if you’d like and show the community how much of a moron you really are.[/quote]

If you think its spam then dont comment or post. Its that simple dude.

Read full topic

item.title: Why not?
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

eyeownyew:

Also, we’re not nearly as good as the Jagex/Runescape devs. Even with the entire community, we couldn’t make what they have (mainly due to the fact that we couldn’t cooperate as long as they have, and there wouldn’t be any pay involved).

Thats what takes the community to the next level. I know it wont be as good a jagex, But you have to start somewhere. Runescape started of as a (in my opinion) shitty 2d game. Look where it is now. runescape started with just three people i think, but we could have a whole community. If everyone gets the right mindset and be mature about it we could all cooperate. Yes some worker at jagex studios does what they do for the money. but some do it just to make a great game.

Read full topic

All these RS remakes are great and all, but if you really want it that bad just play RS.

Also, we’re not nearly as good as the Jagex/Runescape devs. Even with the entire community, we couldn’t make what they have (mainly due to the fact that we couldn’t cooperate as long as they have, and there wouldn’t be any pay involved).

World of Warcraft v_2.0, especially with that new beta shit they’ve been posting on youtube

poopler, i’d love to help with this, but I don’t know how long it would live. As elve said, community efforts usually don’t last that long.[/quote]

then join us http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539866.0.html

item.title: Why not?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

We’ve talked about this countless times, people work differently, have different time zones, work schedules, and usually group projects don’t last more than 3 months.

Why are some people remaking Runescape, because the game has changed and it is NOTHING like it was.

Read full topic

item.title: Why not?
item.dc:creator: @poopler40 poopler40
item.description:
@poopler40 wrote:

This community has all this talent. we have server Programmers, 2d artist, 3d model maker, and client programmers. But Most of it is wasted. All these RS remakes are great and all, but if you really want it that bad just play RS. Why dont the community come together and a site server? Use the RS world. but with own models, story line, revised game engine, interfaces. Just make our own game. Im not talking about just putting and npc here and their like most of the servers today. Im talking about a full scale game. I know it will take time. But it think if the community could come together and pull something like this off. It could take us to the next level.

Read full topic
